commit message: Added tag v0.5.21 for changeset 84057174eeb9

- Add status message when waiting for network.
- Using a priority higher than PRIORITY_MIN stop the flickering of the notification but make the icon visible again :/
update todo.txt
Replace /mnt/sdcard with real location of external storage, add read sdcard permission to manifest
Merge

If user choses not import the certificate embed the file into the config

--HG--
extra : rebase_source : ed8d57424ed886729896597eed253a1cf95d8d11
Allow embedding of plcs12 files from the fileselect dialog
Update todo.txt

Correct the type of text for the basic settings. (closes issue #86)

Add FAQ entry for the network configuration

extra : rebase_source : e12b613b8af3ee647070d67ada96553cbdb40b97
Fix null pointer when connecting with pkcs12 and no password set.
Complete german translation and fix may spelling mistakes.
Fix a bug that  if OpeVPN itself decided to reconnect the application was waiting for a network change
Give all traffic notifications the same time, fixes the blinking notification for me (closes issue #75)
increase Version number
Update openvpn version. Matches github.com/schwabe/openvpn
Commit 3615b6646754c89fca055260528e0cbf671936e0 from git
Add Czech translation by Jan Baier, many thanks! (closes issue #90)
Add support for persist-tun option (closes issue #83)
set persist-tun Default to false. It does to play well with reconnects and DNS resolving
Update openvpn to https://github.com/schwabe/openvpn/tree/android_2.3beta1
Make openvpn version report the real ABI
